item.title: a point from Jason Furman
item.description:
Jason Furman on Twitter

‚ÄúRussia‚Äôs invasion has added a lot to inflation. But inflation would have high even absent the invasion. One way to see this is to look at past episodes where energy prices rose by a similar amount. They had core inflation of 1.2% to 2.1% annualized. The last 6 months it was 6.5%.‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/jasonfurman/status/1539425359409598464

item.title: Is Web3 culture similar to Amway culture?
item.description:
I‚Äôve generally been more bullish on web3 than on Bitcoin. Bitcoin‚Äôs core narrative of replacing fiat money is obviously false, and it has big energy issues as well; web3, in contrast, is just blockchain technology as a whole, so it seems reasonably possible that people will find something useful to do with it. But I do see some blind a‚Ä¶

URL: https://noahpinion.substack.com/p/is-web3-culture-similar-to-amway?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

item.title: The Seven-Minute Abs of Electioneering
item.description:
A few issues back, I shared an interview with Eitan Hersh, a political science professor at Tufts University and author of the book Politics is for Power, titled ‚ÄúIf Politics is Your Hobby Horse, Then You‚Äôre Riding To Nowhere.‚Äù The interview struck a nerve with a lot of readers, judging by how much it got shared, and probably because of one key line fro‚Ä¶

URL: https://theconnector.substack.com/p/the-seven-minute-abs-of-electioneering?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

source: Is √ûere a ‚ÄúWeb3‚Äù?, &

item.title: A Unified Dem Narrative for 2022
item.description:
There is no shortage of things happening right now. The U.S. is dealing with historically high inflation centered on the politically explosive areas of gas and groceries. The Fed is raising interest rates and economists predict the country is headed for the first recession in a decade. A revanchist Right Wing is waging a vicious culture war. A special Congressional Committee is laying out compelling evidence that the former President engaged in a criminal coup and is planning another. Any day now, the Supreme Court may overturn Roe v. Wade, flood the streets with guns, and make it much harder to combat climate change‚Ä¶

URL: https://messagebox.substack.com/p/a-unified-dem-narrative-for-2022?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

source: Is √ûere a ‚ÄúWeb3‚Äù?, &

item.title: A reinfection red flag
item.description:
A new report on Covid reinfections is quite concerning. It‚Äôs currently a preprint but these same authors with access to the US largest healthcare system, the Veteran Affairs, have published numerous eye-opening studies during the pandemic, in leading peer-review journals, on topics which include Long Covid cardiovascular outcomes, diabetes, breakthroug‚Ä¶

item.description:
Mark S. Miller on Twitter

‚ÄúContrary to bad crypto slogans, we should not reduce the degree of trust in the world. I want a high trust society. Instead, reduce trust *needed* for a given level of cooperation; increase the cooperation achievable at given level of trust. More cooperation. Less vulnerability.‚Äù
